title: Acknowledge Safety Alert
description: A light curtain on a robotic arm has been tripped, pausing the machine. The area supervisor needs to acknowledge and resolve the alert.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the safety alert in the control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the alert, noting the time and location.

tasks.description: Review safety camera footage to determine the cause of the alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the footage and sees a piece of cardboard fell into the path of the sensor.

tasks.description: Log the cause, clear the obstruction, and reset the machine to resume operation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs 'Foreign Object' as the cause and successfully restarts the machine.
